title: Рідний Крим
overview: Since the beginning of the Russian occupation of Crimea, about 45,000 Crimean people, including many Crimean Tatars, have left for mainland Ukraine. The Russian occupation authorities are actively persecuting Crimean Tatars on ethnic grounds. Over the years of occupation, many cases of kidnapping, missing people, house searches, arrests, and torture of members of the Crimean Tatar community have been recorded. Crimean Tatars have been unable to return safely to their homeland for 7 years.In the series created jointly with the Ukrainian Institute, the heroes in VR glasses look at sights in Crimea that are important to them, and share their memories and memorable stories about their native peninsula.
